sent.orig: In spite of the fall from his horse, his leg was surprisingly uninjured.
sent.trans: 尽管从马上摔了下来，他的腿却出人意外地未受伤害。

sent.orig: In other words, they were surprisingly humorous.
sent.trans: 换句话说，他们令人吃惊地幽默。

sent.orig: Surprisingly, the film was not too bad at all.
sent.trans: 出人意料，这部电影相当不错。

sent.orig: Not surprisingly, their relationship has grown because of the improved communication.
sent.trans: 由于加深了沟通，无怪他们的夫妻关系也就更融洽了。

sent.orig: The group's members have shown a surprisingly high level of compliance around 80%. As a result.
sent.trans: 针对减产协议，各成员国也显示了高度惊人的服从度──达到了80%左右。
